topics.body:
I dunno if anyone actually cares, but I just discovered one of the coolest things. 

There's this program that you can get for your computer called "gifcam". After downloading it, all you have to do is pull up whatever you want to make a gif out of - a YT video, for example - pull gifcam's frame over the appropriate area, and hit record. It'll make nice quality gifs out of anything!

I made stuff like this out of a playthrough: 

!http://38.media.tumblr.com/378351cb6235ad943f7bcdadf7a3f334/tumblr_np676594nf1ux4dleo1_400.gif!


It's really neat.
